hero.title: Open-source
hero.subtitle: We develop open-source solutions to improve education. We help businesses, schools, universities and content creators to offer better learning experiences.

metadata.title: Zoonk: Open-source solutions for education
metadata.description: Zoonk provides open-source learning tools for businesses, schools, universities and content creators.

twitter.title: Zoonk
twitter.description: We provide open-source learning tools for businesses, schools, universities and content creators.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: You can contact us at support@zoonk.org or schedule an appointment below:

metadata.title: Contact us - Zoonk
metadata.description: Reach out to the Zoonk team or schedule an appointment.

about.title: Our mission
about.subtitle: Everything we do requires us to learn something but learning isn't always easy or fun. We want to change that.
about.content_1: We're building open-source tools to improve our experience while learning things.
about.content_2:
Learning should be fun.
Learning should be practical.
Learning should be easy.
Learning should be accessible.
about.content_3: By improving how we learn things, we want to empower a new generation of makers because if we fix education, then we can fix everything else.

metadata.title: About us - Zoonk
metadata.description: Learn more about Zoonk and our mission.

wikaro.title: For businesses
wikaro.description: Create interactive guides to engage your employees and attract new customers. It’s easier, faster and cheaper than making video lessons.

ikidoo.title: For schools
ikidoo.description: Create fun, interactive lessons with real-life examples and aligned with the AP curriculum. Save time on lesson planning.

wisek.title: For creators
wisek.description: Create interactive courses and earn money. It's easier and faster than producing videos. We only charge you a small comission fee.

uneebee.title: Open-source
uneebee.description: Open-source tool for creating interactive courses like Duolingo. Install it on your servers and own your data. MIT license.
